item.description:
Caribbean Candy is a Newport-based contemporary high-energy instrumental trio with John Monllos on guitar, Art Manchester on sax, flute, and clarinet, and John LaMoia on percussion. There is no cover and no minimum. Seating is limited to 40 on the deck and 12 at the bar.

Summer Time and the Living is Easy on the Roof of the Hotel Viking'

The roof deck at Hotel Viking – is an amazing vantage point from which to sit back, relax with friends and take in the panoramic view of America’s “first resort”. The Top Of Newport is a haven for guests, town folk and visitors from miles around. It’s a fun, convivial spot to have cocktail coolers and refreshing frozen drinks including, ‘Blue-cumber’, ‘Gingerita’ and 'Viking Green Tea'; accompanied by chilled plates such as Island Creek Oysters; Narragansett Littleneck Clams; Lobster Club 'Sliders'; or A Charcuterie Tasting. Top Of Newport features live entertainment throughout the summer, highlighting local Rhode Island musicians.
